content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'D_VENDEDORES' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'SILVER')
CREATE TABLE SILVER.D_VENDEDORES
	(
	 [ID_VENDEDOR] int,
	 [NOME_VENDEDOR] nvarchar(4000),
	 [SALARIO] numeric(10,2)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_D_VENDEDORES
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO SILVER.D_VENDEDORES
(ID_VENDEDOR 1, NOME_VENDEDOR 2, SALARIO 3)
FROM 'https://adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/silver/vendedores'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM SILVER.D_VENDEDORES
GO
